content: तृष् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (तृष्यति, तृषित) {@--1@} To be thirsty; <ls>Bk. 7. 106</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 30</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 51.</ls> {@--2@} To wish, wish excessively, be cager or greedy.

तृष् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [तृष्-संप° क्विप्] {@--1@} (<ab>nom.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> तृट्-ड्) {1} Thirst; तृषा शुष्यत्यास्ये पिबति सलिलं स्वादु सुरभि <ls>Bh. 3. 92</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Strong desire, eagerness. {@--3@} Desire personified as the daughter of Kāma.
